entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @Endgame2021 Definitely trump. At least with COVID-19 we can put policies in place to treat, test, track with a responsible person in the WH. And the DPA could make sure all the PPE that is needed was manufactured for minimum cost and delivered to those that need them. We can handle Covid.
